MUSYOKI MUTUA
About Experience Roadmap Projects Skills Terminal Contact
About Experience Roadmap Projects Skills Terminal Contact

Innovative Software Engineer

Building AI solutions that transform healthcare through technology.

Contact Me View Projects
AVAILABLE FOR WORK

About Me

I'm a Software Engineer specializing in AI-powered healthcare solutions, with expertise in machine learning and natural language processing.

My approach combines technical precision with domain knowledge, resulting in AI systems that are both innovative and practically valuable.

Download CV

AI Development

Designing and implementing machine learning models for healthcare applications.

Data Engineering

Building pipelines and infrastructure for processing medical data at scale.

NLP Expertise

Developing natural language processing systems for medical documentation.

Analytics

Transforming complex healthcare data into actionable insights.

Professional Experience

Apex Cura Healthcare IT

April 2024 - Present
  • Building a AI powered SaaS product for hospitals
  • Fine-tuning LLM's to achieve the medical knowledge
  • Implemented a RAG pipeline for a hospital specific chatbot
  • Created a AI based Suggestion system to help doctors write the prescription effortlessly
  • Built a Copilot for our product

A U R O R A E - L A B S

Aug 2023 - Mar 2024
  • Built POC for converting natural language to SQL/Cypher query
  • Another POC includes audio transcription using LLM's

ANUBRAIN TECHNOLOGY

Mar 2023 - July 2023

Executed numerous data science projects as a freelancer, delivering solutions tailored to client needs and requirements.

S H U N Y A O S

Jan 2023 - March 2023

Spearheaded pedestrian detection projects, undertaking data labeling tasks independently to ensure high-quality training data.

Learning Roadmap

My journey of continuous learning and skill development in data science and AI

2023 - Phase 1

Foundational Skills

  • Mastered Python fundamentals and data structures
  • Learned core statistics and probability concepts
  • Completed courses in data analysis with Pandas/Numpy
  • Built first machine learning models (Scikit-learn)
1
2023 - Phase 2

Deep Learning Fundamentals

  • Learned PyTorch and TensorFlow frameworks
  • Implemented CNNs for computer vision
  • Study of NLP basics (RNNs, Transformers)
  • Deployed first models to production
2
2024 - Phase 3

Advanced AI Concepts

  • Fine-tuning LLMs for medical applications
  • Implementation of RAG pipelines
  • MLOps and model deployment best practices
  • Graph databases and knowledge graphs
3
2024 - Phase 4

Healthcare AI Specialization

  • Medical imaging and diagnostic AI
  • Clinical NLP and structured data extraction
  • Regulatory compliance (HIPAA, FDA) for AI
  • Building explainable AI for healthcare
4
Future

Ongoing Learning Goals

  • Multimodal AI combining imaging and text
  • Few-shot and zero-shot learning techniques
  • AI for personalized medicine applications
  • Edge AI for real-time clinical decision support
5
